body.p:
When you execute the validation check the Swift service can trigger an error. To rectify the error perform the following steps:
Log onto the node that has been designated as the Ring-Builder. You must run the _swift-validate-input-model.yml playbook as mentioned in step 2 in otherwise the files needed to run the swiftlm-ring-supervisor will not be in place on the node.
Execute the following command:sudo swiftlm-ring-supervisor --make-delta --report
The command will report any errors or problems with the input model. It also prints a summary of the ring create actions that are planned (i.e., that will occur) for the deploy phase of the process.
